OpenKIM vagrant box¶

Introduction to vagrant¶

Vagrant is a ruby wrapper around VirtualBox, a VM environment produced by Oracle which is available across most platforms. It allows you to package a ‘box’ (basically a compressed VB image) and ship it out to others. On top of this, there is a flexible provisioning framework provided by shell scripts, Chef, and Puppet provisioners which install all of the necessary software on top of a base box.

Once you have a vagrant.box file, to start it up you would run:

vagrant box add someboxname vagrant.box
vagrant init someboxname
vagrant up

But there are simpler ways as well.
